title: Derivatives as Rates of Change
body: A potato is launched vertically upward with an initial velocity of $$100$$ $$\frac{ft}{s}$$ from a potato gun at the top of an 85-foot-tall building. The distance in feet that the potato travels from the ground after $$t$$ seconds is given by s(t) $$=$$ $$-16t^2$$ + $$100t$$ + $$85$$.
